companies.name: Tesla
companies.description: Leading electric vehicle manufacturer developing advanced autonomous driving systems, humanoid robots (Optimus), and AI-powered manufacturing automation. Pioneer in integrating robotics with sustainable energy solutions.

companies.name: Boston Dynamics
companies.description: Creator of highly dynamic robots including Spot (quadruped), Atlas (humanoid), and Stretch (warehouse automation). Known for breakthrough achievements in robot mobility, balance, and agility using advanced control systems.

companies.name: NVIDIA
companies.description: Leading AI computing company providing Isaac robotics platform, Jetson edge AI modules, and GPU-accelerated simulation tools. Powers AI and vision systems for autonomous machines, robots, and intelligent devices worldwide.

companies.name: ABB Robotics
companies.description: Global leader in industrial robotics with 500,000+ robot installations worldwide. Specializes in manufacturing automation, collaborative robots (YuMi), and digital solutions for automotive, electronics, and logistics industries.

companies.name: KUKA
companies.description: German robotics pioneer providing industrial robots, cobots, and automated manufacturing systems. Renowned for precision, reliability, and innovation in automotive production, aerospace, and general industry applications.

companies.name: Universal Robots
companies.description: Market leader in collaborative robot arms (cobots) designed to work safely alongside humans. Offers flexible, easy-to-program automation solutions for small and medium enterprises across diverse industries.

companies.name: FANUC
companies.description: World's largest industrial robot manufacturer with over 750,000 robots installed globally. Provides comprehensive factory automation including CNC systems, robots, and smart manufacturing solutions with legendary reliability.

companies.name: iRobot
companies.description: Pioneer in consumer robotics, creator of Roomba robotic vacuum cleaners and Braava mopping robots. Leader in autonomous home cleaning with over 40 million robots sold, utilizing advanced navigation and mapping technologies.

companies.name: Intuitive Surgical
companies.description: Global leader in robotic-assisted surgery with the da Vinci Surgical System. Enables minimally invasive procedures with enhanced vision, precision, and control. Revolutionizing healthcare with over 10 million procedures performed worldwide.

companies.name: DJI
companies.description: World's leading drone manufacturer controlling 70%+ of the consumer and commercial drone market. Provides advanced aerial imaging, agricultural drones, industrial inspection systems, and autonomous flight technologies.

companies.name: Waymo
companies.description: Alphabet's self-driving technology company and leader in autonomous vehicle development. Operating commercial robotaxi services with millions of autonomous miles driven. Pioneer in sensor fusion, machine learning, and safe autonomous mobility.

companies.name: Amazon Robotics
companies.description: Develops and deploys advanced mobile robots, robotic arms, and AI-powered systems for warehouse automation. Over 750,000 robots operating in Amazon fulfillment centers, revolutionizing e-commerce logistics and supply chain efficiency.

companies.name: Yaskawa
companies.description: Japanese robotics and motion control leader producing Motoman industrial robots and advanced servo systems. Specializes in arc welding, material handling, and assembly automation with over 500,000 robots installed worldwide.

companies.name: Omron
companies.description: Global automation leader providing mobile robots, collaborative systems, and AI-powered industrial solutions. Focuses on human-machine collaboration, sensing technology, and intelligent factory automation for Industry 4.0.
